Reviews.Title: Camera, OK, Case not!
Reviews.Author: Quinton VanZant II
Reviews.Content: Camera, was as stated, but the case that came with the package, wouldn't even fit the camera! Why even say it has one, if it had been a Christmas gift I would have sent it back!

Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: Austin
Reviews.Content: The whole package was really affordable. I wanted a relatively inexpensive camera for my camping and hiking trips, and this is what I needed.

ProductInfo.Features:
16.0 Megapixel sensor and Canon DIGIC 4 Image Processor deliver enhanced image quality.
Capture impressive 720p HD video in stereo sound with a dedicated movie button and zoom while shooting.
Large 3.0" LCD offers easy viewing even from a wide angle.
Canon's powerful 16x Optical Zoom and 28mm Wide-Angle lens with Optical Image Stabilizer helps reduce camera shake so you achieve brilliant images whether you are up close or far away.
Intelligent IS automatically chooses from six different modes to optimize image stabilization for shake-free images in a wide variety of conditions.
ProductInfo.Name: Canon PowerShot SX170 IS 16MP Digital Camera with 16x Optical Zoom and 3-inch LCD in Black + 16GB SDHC + Replacement NB-6L Battery + Focus Multi Card Reader + Compact Camera Case + Spider Tripod + Accessory Kit
